title: Our Key Programmes
description: We focus on three strategic areas to achieve lasting impact in the communities we serve.

programs.name: Health & Disability Management
programs.summary: Focuses on inclusive health access and HIV/AIDS management within vulnerable groups.

programs.name: Human Rights and Gender Equity
programs.summary: Advocating for the rights and participation of women and people with disabilities.

programs.name: Environmental Sustainability
programs.summary: Promoting sustainable practices and climate change resilience in local communities.
